contractObjectiveList.title: Take control of the Defenders turrets
Don't allow any Defenders reinforcements to land
Destroy the spaceport's DropShip control center

dialogueContent.words: Bring down the Control center and the rest will be easy Commander.
Commander, I'm Seeing Vehicle Reinforcements on Radar, be carefull.
Commander, The Dropships are almost here, Bringing down the control center should be our primary goal.
Good Job Commander, We are landing a dropship to get the turrets under our control.
Roger that, Commander. We'll have their turrets under friendly control in just a moment.
Engage the forces guarding that control center, {COMMANDER.Callsign}.
We are almost out of time. We cannot win this without taking down the control center.
You only have a few more moments before the dropships are on top of us.
The control Center is taking damage. Keep it up.
If we don't stop those battlemechs, We will loose control of this planet. Concentrate Firepower.
The Turrets have been hacked! Quickly destroy them!
Great job, Extraction Inboud
Roger that, Head to the extraction zone and I will pick you up.
I am no longer seeing communication to the reinforcments.
Ground control,—we've lost you! [loud clanging] Nav support is off-line—where are the damned tugs?! [louder clanging] [alarm klaxon begins to blare]
Great work, I will let our employer know that this planet is as good as theirs.
All in a days pay.
All targets eliminated. Sit tight, and I can collect you from where you are at right now.
Commander. The landing zone was tight but Sumire got us their in one piece.
We should talk about a pay raise.
We have to disable those pads so that reinforcments do not make planet fall.
{COMMANDER.Callsign}, We will need to destroy the enemy forces and disable the Command Center.
Looks like you will have company soon Commander.
We cannot allow reinforcments to land commander. Take out the command center asap.
I have a second run incomming, Full of engineers to take over the turrets.
Having Turret Support to cover us would be a great boon.
All communication cut, Great work Commander.
The dropships seem to have lost Navigation lock.
Without Ground support they will not be able to land without tugs.
Also it has made my flight path a lot easier.

longDescription: We will only have a short amount of time to get to the control station to disable the landing pads, Make sure the mechs you drop with have enough speed Commander.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Dropship Control Center before the Dropships arrive
The DropShip Control Center Must be Down before the Dropships Arrive
Destroy the Garrison Units Before the Engineers Arrive

shortDescription: The Defending army has a starport near by. We have been contracted to disable the starport so the defending army will be cut off from their reinforcements.
